verses.verse: I <S%G1473><s%> <S%G1263>charge<s%> thee <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> who <S%G3195>shall<s%> <S%G2919>judge<s%> the <S%G2198>quick<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G3498>dead<s%> <S%G2596>at<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G2015>appearing<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G932>kingdom;<s%>

Preach <S%G2784><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3056>word;<s%> be <S%G2186>instant<s%> in <S%G2122>season,<s%> out of <S%G171>season;<s%> <S%G1651>reprove,<s%> <S%G2008>rebuke,<s%> <S%G3870>exhort<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3115>longsuffering<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1322>doctrine.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> the <S%G2540>time<s%> will <S%G2071>come<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> they will <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G430>endure<s%> <S%G5198>sound<s%> <S%G1319>doctrine;<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> their <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G1939>lusts<s%> shall they <S%G2002>heap<s%> to <S%G1438>themselves<s%> <S%G1320>teachers,<s%> having <S%G2833>itching<s%> <S%G189>ears;<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> they shall turn <S%G654>away<s%> their <S%G189>ears<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3303><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G225>truth,<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> shall be <S%G1624>turned<s%> <S%G1909>unto<s%> <S%G3454>fables.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3525>watch<s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> all <S%G3956>things,<s%> endure <S%G2553>afflictions,<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> the <S%G2041>work<s%> of an <S%G2099>evangelist,<s%> make full <S%G4135>proof<s%> of <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G1248>ministry.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> am now ready to be <S%G4689>offered,<s%> <S%G2235><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2540>time<s%> of <S%G1699>my<s%> <S%G359>departure<s%> is at <S%G2186>hand.<s%>
I have <S%G75>fought<s%> a <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G73>fight,<s%> I have <S%G5055>finished<s%> my <S%G1408>course,<s%> I have <S%G5083>kept<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> faith: <S%G4102><s%>

Henceforth <S%G3063><s%> there is laid <S%G606>up<s%> for <S%G3427>me<s%> a <S%G4735>crown<s%> of <S%G1343>righteousness,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1342>righteous<s%> <S%G2923>judge,<s%> shall <S%G591>give<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G2250>day:<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> to <S%G1698>me<s%> <S%G3440>only,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> unto <S%G3956>all<s%> them also that <S%G25>love<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2015>appearing.<s%>
Do thy <S%G4704>diligence<s%> to <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G5030>shortly<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> me: <S%G3165><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G1214>Demas<s%> hath <S%G1459>forsaken<s%> <S%G3165>me,<s%> having <S%G25>loved<s%> this <S%G3568>present<s%> <S%G165>world,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> is <S%G4198>departed<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G2332>Thessalonica;<s%> <S%G2913>Crescens<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G1053>Galatia,<s%> <S%G5103>Titus<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G1149>Dalmatia.<s%>

Only <S%G3441><s%> <S%G3065>Luke<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G1700>me.<s%> <S%G353>Take<s%> <S%G3138>Mark,<s%> and <S%G71>bring<s%> him <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G4572>thee:<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> he <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G2173>profitable<s%> to <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> the <S%G1248>ministry.<s%>
And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5190>Tychicus<s%> have I <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2181>Ephesus.<s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5341>cloak<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> I <S%G620>left<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G5174>Troas<s%> <S%G3844>with<s%> <S%G2591>Carpus,<s%> when thou <S%G2064>comest,<s%> <S%G5342>bring<s%> with thee, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G975>books,<s%> but <S%G3122>especially<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3200>parchments.<s%>

Alexander <S%G223><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5471>coppersmith<s%> <S%G1731>did<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G2556>evil:<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G591>reward<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to <S%G846>his<s%> works: <S%G2041><s%>
Of <S%G3739>whom<s%> be thou <S%G5442>ware<s%> <S%G4771><s%> <S%G2532>also;<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> he hath <S%G3029>greatly<s%> <S%G436>withstood<s%> <S%G2251>our<s%> <S%G3056>words.<s%>

At <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G627>answer<s%> no <S%G3762>man<s%> stood <S%G4836>with<s%> <S%G3427>me,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> men <S%G1459>forsook<s%> <S%G3165>me:<s%> I pray God that it may <S%G3361>not<s%> be laid to their <S%G3049>charge.<s%> <S%G846><s%>

Notwithstanding <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> stood <S%G3936>with<s%> <S%G3427>me,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1743>strengthened<s%> <S%G3165>me;<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G1700>me<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2782>preaching<s%> might be fully <S%G4135>known,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> that <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> might <S%G191>hear:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> I was <S%G4506>delivered<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G4750>mouth<s%> of the <S%G3023>lion.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> shall <S%G4506>deliver<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G4190>evil<s%> <S%G2041>work,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> will <S%G4982>preserve<s%> me <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G2032>heavenly<s%> <S%G932>kingdom:<s%> to <S%G3739>whom<s%> be <S%G1391>glory<s%> forever and <S%G1519>ever.<s%> <S%G165><s%> <S%G165><s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%>
Salute <S%G782><s%> <S%G4251>Prisca<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G207>Aquila,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3624>household<s%> of <S%G3683>Onesiphorus.<s%>
Erastus <S%G2037><s%> <S%G3306>abode<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G2882>Corinth:<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G5161>Trophimus<s%> have I <S%G620>left<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G3399>Miletum<s%> <S%G770>sick.<s%>

Do thy <S%G4704>diligence<s%> to <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> <S%G5494>winter.<s%> <S%G2103>Eubulus<s%> <S%G782>greeteth<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4227>Pudens,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3044>Linus,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2803>Claudia,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G80>brethren.<s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> be <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G4151>spirit.<s%> <S%G5485>Grace<s%> be <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G5216>you.<s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%>
